name: CleanUnsplash
description: CleanUnsplash is visual improvement to Unsplash with Toggle able Day & Night Mode Features: - Cleaned Interface with rounded buttons and forms - Colorful Action buttons - Fully themed Night Mode Gallery: Clean Unplash
additional_info: Please DM me if you encounter a bug or some issue before rating the theme Changelog [2/03/2019] - More color bugs fixed [2/02/2019] - Fixed color a lot of color bugs and stylized new upload [1/04/2019] - Fixed color bug on In Explore tab [6/29/2018] - Currently reworking the whole code to be adaptive to the new updates the unsplash makes [6/06/2018] - Fixed Searchbox Color bug [5/29/2018] - Fixed Minor issues [5/26/2018] - Initial Release
